headline: Rowan Says People ‘Lost Their Minds’ Over Private Credit Fears
summary: Apollo’s CEO pushed back on the idea that private credit is less transparent than traditional loans during a presentation on the firm’s retirement services businesses.

raw.headline: Rowan Says People ‘Lost Their Minds’ Over Private Credit Fears

headline: ‘Dr. Doom’ Nouriel Roubini breaks with the crowd on the AI bubble, saying the U.S. is headed for a ‘growth recession’ and not a market crash
summary: “The now common view,” according to the NYU Stern School of Business professor emeritus, “is incorrect over the medium term.”
